name: GauntletQueen's Extreme Egg Stacker
description:
Stack eggs as fast as you can!

GauntletQueen, everyone's favorite low poly vtuber, has a redeem for viewers to add an egg on-screen on their behalf. She stacks them as a monument to her fans. Take her place and stack those eggs!!

Credits (Official credits in game):

  • Font is FFFForward
  • Music is Spazzmatica Polka 
  • Everything else is by me!
